briefdescription.para: Create a new Internal Display object.

parameterdescription.para: The HardwareSerial object that is connected to the display

briefdescription.para: Initialize the Internal Display.

simplesect.para: You should not call this function directly, instead use ESPMegaIoT::enableInternalDisplay()

parameterdescription.para: A function that returns the current time

briefdescription.para: The main loop of the Internal Display.

simplesect.para: You should not call this function directly, instead use ESPMega::loop()

briefdescription.para: Set the input card to be be shown on the input page.

parameterdescription.para: The input card object to be shown

briefdescription.para: Set the output card to be be shown on the output page.

parameterdescription.para: The output card object to be shown

briefdescription.para: Set the climate card to be be shown on the AC page.

detaileddescription.para: This assume that your ClimeateCard has the mode and fan speed names in the following order: mode: [off, fan_only, cool] fan_speed: [auto, low, medium, high]

parameterdescription.para: The climate card object to be shown

briefdescription.para: Unbind the input card from the display.
Unbind the output card from the display.
Unbind the climate card from the display.
Update the display in response to a change in the input state.

parameterdescription.para: The new state of the pin

briefdescription.para: Update the display in response to a change in the PWM state.

parameterdescription.para: The new state of the pin
The new value of the pin

briefdescription.para: Update the display in response to page change.
Set the PWM status output bar value (Fullness of the bar)
Set the PWM status output bar color to match the PWM state.
Set Input Marker to match the input state.
Handle the AC state change.

simplesect.para: This function is registered as a callback to the ClimateCard

briefdescription.para: Save the network config to the FRAM.
Save the MQTT config to the FRAM.
Update the status icons on the Internal Display's top bar.
Update the clock on the Internal Display's top bar.
Send data to display element on the current page.
Send data to display element on the specified page.

simplesect.para: The current page must be the specified page

briefdescription.para: Send data to display element on the dashboard page.
Send data to display element on the input page.
Send data to display element on the output page.
Send data to display element on the AC page.

Send the PWM value to the display on the PWM Adjustment page.

Send data to display element on the network config page.
Send data to display element on the mqtt config page.
Write an ip address to the display.

simplesect.para: This function only writes the ip address to the display, you need to send the prefix and suffix yourself

briefdescription.para: Handle the touch event on the display.

The component that the touch event occured

The component that the touch event occured

parameterdescription.para: The type of the touch event
The component that the touch event occured

briefdescription.para: The internal display of the ESPMegaPRO.

detaileddescription.para: This is the display that is installed on some ESPMegaPRO Chassis. It is a 3.5" TFT LCD with a resistive touch screen.
You can use this display to monitor the status of the ESPMegaPRO and also to control the various components of the ESPMegaPRO.
If you are using a custom display, you need to create a class that inherits from ESPMegaDisplay and implement the methods in that class, you may refer to this class for reference.

simplesect.para: This class is automatically instantiated by the ESPMegaPRO and can be accessed via the display variable.
